page.title: 11POLITICS
page.content: The people of the area are represented by three County Councillors,5 borough councillors and two community councils.Ruabon has its own community council and Cefn Mawr,Acrefair, Rhosymedre and Newbridge combine to form a 16 strong council.They meet once a month,on Tuesday evening,to discuss general council business. Other meetings are called to discuss finance,burial and lighting.They have been few elections for the council in recent years,due to the lack of opposition.This year,however,there were a number of contested elections.There were a number of local issues involved.The most important were the problems caused by the Delph Open Cast Mine and the pollution of the River Dee.Other issues were the proposed open market in Cefn and a country park on the Ty Mawr estate.
